title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Domain/URL Update
description: To align the URL with the new Viva Engage branding and as part of the unified domain for Microsoft 365 initiative, Viva Engageâ€™s URL schema is being updated. This change includes domains only. A separate roadmap will be created for email sender changes. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
